description.main_subject: Computer screen displaying a video conference and a text editor
description.detailed_description: A screenshot captures a computer screen displaying a Microsoft Teams video conference alongside an open Notepad document detailing topics related to 'Convex Optimization.' The interface shows a speaker's video feed, participant icons, and a taskbar with various applications, suggesting an active online lecture or study session. The lighting is uniform, typical of a digital display.
